location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photograph of a Palm Grove, Salalah

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 black and white photographDimensions: 85 x 139mm, on sheet 331 x 202mm

mods.abstract: Photograph of a palm grove on the shore at Salalah, in the Sultanate of Muscat and Oman. In the foreground on the right are sardines that have been left to dry.This photograph is part of a series of photographs that appear at the end of a preliminary report on the land resources of Dhofar, produced by Brian Joseph Hartley, Director of Agriculture, Aden, and dated 20 March 1948.
